T02D3532:173a-1: kalpokta m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
T02D3532:173a-3: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3532:173a-4: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3532:173a-5: rnam par snang mdzad rigs byung ba'i //
T02D3532:173a-7: rtog pa las gsungs cho ga yis //
T02D3532:173a-8: de yi sgrub thabs rim pa bshad //
T02D3532:173a-9: de la re zhig dpal 'od zer can gyi dkyil
T02D3532:173a-10: 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas rang gi dam
T02D3532:173a-11: tshig dang sdom pa yongs su bskyang zhing dag pa'i
T02D3532:173a-12: sems kyis sems can thams cad gdon pa'i bsam pas
T02D3532:173a-13: / aom phat ces brjod pas khra bo'i khu tshur gyis snying ga dang /
T02D3532:173a-15: mgo bo rnams su bkod nas zhal bsang ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3532:173a-16: lha'i khang par rab tu zhugs te /
T02D3532:173a-17: bris sku la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i skra
T02D3532:173a-18: bkram nas 'od zer can gyi sngags yongs su bzlas
T02D3532:173a-19: pa'i dri'i chus bgegs bskrad nas de bzhin du nyer
T02D3532:173a-20: spyod lnga la sogs pa rab tu sbyar te /
T02D3532:173a-21: de la bgegs skrod pa'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02D3532:173a-22: aom m'a r'i tsyee h'um sarba bighna nud s'a r'a ya h'um phat /
T02D3532:173a-23: de nas rang gi snying ga'i dang po'i yi ges
T02D3532:173a-24: mtshan pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3532:173a-26: de'i steng du du dang po'i bcu gsum pa'i sa
T02D3532:173a-27: bon la zla phyed dang thig les brgyan pa la
T02D3532:173a-28: tsha zhing 'od zer can gyi 'od dang ldan pa
T02D3532:173a-29: / de las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros te 'od
T02D3532:173a-30: zer rnams rdzogs pa las bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku
T02D3532:173a-32: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang dmigs nas mchod cing phyag btsal nas sngags 'di'o //
T02D3532:173a-33: aom m'a r'i tsyee pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D3532:173a-34: aom m'a r'i tsyee dh'u pam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D3532:173a-35: aom m'a r'i tsyee sv'a he tyar gham pa ri dza sya /
T02D3532:173a-36: aom m'a r'i tsyee aargham pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D3532:173a-37: dngos po med na bsam gtan gyis kyang ngo //
T02D3532:173a-39: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3532:173a-40: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3532:173a-41: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3532:173a-42: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3532:173a-43: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02D3532:173a-44: byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3532:173a-45: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D3532:173a-46: byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed //
T02D3532:173a-47: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
T02D3532:173b-0: sems can thams @173b cad mgron du gnyer //
T02D3532:173b-1: byang chub spyod mchog spyad par bgyi //
T02D3532:173b-2: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas shog / ces pa
T02D3532:173b-3: lan gsum brjod nas smon lam sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3532:173b-4: dge ba bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3532:173b-5: sngags 'dis aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva
T02D3532:173b-6: bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod nas sa bon
T02D3532:173b-7: sgyu ma'i dpe rnams bsams te /
T02D3532:173b-8: khams gsum ma lus pa yang bltas pa dang /
T02D3532:173b-9: reg pa thams cad dper na sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02D3532:173b-10: dmigs pa med pas de bzhin du 'gro ba gnas
T02D3532:173b-11: pa thams cad kyang so sor snang ba tsam du
T02D3532:173b-12: rtogs pas / de nas thog ma med pa'i dus
T02D3532:173b-13: kyi rnam pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D3532:173b-14: sa bon spangs nas rang bzhin dag pa zhes lhag
T02D3532:173b-16: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3532:173b-17: de nas sngon du gsungs pa'i sa bon rdzogs pa
T02D3532:173b-18: las zla ba'i steng du aom yig de thams cad
T02D3532:173b-19: yongs su gyur pa las dpal ldan mgon po rnam
T02D3532:173b-20: par snang mdzad padma'i snying po dang seng ge'i gdan
T02D3532:173b-21: gyi steng na rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D3532:173b-22: gser gyi mdog lta bu byang chub mchog gi phyag
T02D3532:173b-23: rgya can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D3532:173b-24: ral pa'i cod pan can zhi zhing rgyan thams cad
T02D3532:173b-25: kyis brgyan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3532:173b-26: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3532:173b-27: gyi steng du yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog
T02D3532:173b-28: gi snying po dang po'i gnyis pa dang yang dag
T02D3532:173b-29: par ldan pa zla ba phyed pa dang thig les
T02D3532:173b-31: de las skyes pa'i mya ngan med pa'i shing /
T02D3532:173b-32: de'i steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i mam yig bsams nas /
T02D3532:173b-33: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'od zer can gyi skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3532:173b-34: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can zhes
T02D3532:173b-35: pa sku mdog shin tu ser ba 'dzam bu n'a
T02D3532:173b-36: da'i 'od lta bu 'bar ba mchod rten gyi nang
T02D3532:173b-37: na gnas pa / na bza' dmar po mnabs pa /
T02D3532:173b-38: phu dung dmar po'i stod g-yogs can /
T02D3532:173b-39: phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3532:173b-41: rked pa la dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba dang /
T02D3532:173b-44: zhal gsum pa spyan gsum pa 'bar zhing 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'phro ba /
T02D3532:173b-45: bandu dza ba'i me tog dang mtshungs pa /
T02D3532:174a-1: snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3532:174a-2: mya ngan med pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D3532:174a-3: phyag g-yon pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang /
T02D3532:174a-5: mya ngan med pa'i shing dang /
T02D3532:174a-7: g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje rgyas pa dang /
T02D3532:174a-11: zhal dang po zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i zhal shin tu ser ba gser gyi mdog lta bu /
T02D3532:174a-12: spyan rgyas pa sindu ras brgyan pa /
T02D3532:174a-14: zhal g-yon pa ni phag zhal khro ba dang bcas
T02D3532:174a-15: shing mi sdug pa gtsigs shing 'jigs pa aindra n'i
T02D3532:174a-16: la'i 'od lta bu nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi 'od
T02D3532:174a-17: dang mtshungs pa / shin tu khro gnyer gtsigs shing ljags 'dril ba 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D3532:174a-18: zhal gnyis pa shin du dmar ba mdzes shing 'od zer 'bar ba /
T02D3532:174a-19: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og na gnas pa /
T02D3532:174a-20: me tog gi phreng ba gcal du bkram pa de'i
T02D3532:174a-21: spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mgon du gyur
T02D3532:174a-22: pa sngon du gsungs pa'i sku mdog dang phyag rgya
T02D3532:174a-23: dang ldan pa / 'og tu phag bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3532:174a-24: lang tsho gzhon nur gnas pa shing rta 'dren pa'i
T02D3532:174a-25: phag gi 'og tu yam las byung ba'i rlung gi
T02D3532:174a-26: dkyil 'khor la ham yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3532:174a-27: sgra gcan lag pa dag gis zla ba dang nyi
T02D3532:174a-29: nyin mo snang bar byed cing mtshan mo zla ba
T02D3532:174a-30: dang mtshungs pa lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor bar
T02D3532:174a-31: bsam par bya'o // de la shar du aom m'a
T02D3532:174a-32: r'i tsyee batt'a li ba d'a li b'a ra li
T02D3532:174a-33: b'a r'a h'a mu khi siddhi m'a karsha ya dza:sv'a
T02D3532:174a-34: bsam par bya'o // h'a zhes so // de ltar
T02D3532:174a-35: lha mo sku mdog dmar mo phag zhal gcig pa
T02D3532:174a-36: bsam par bya'o // h'a zhes so // / phyag bzhi pa phu dung dmar po'i stod g-yogs can /
T02D3532:174a-37: phyag g-yon pa zhags pa dang /
T02D3532:174a-38: mya ngan med pa'i shing bsnams pa /
T02D3532:174a-39: g-yas pa rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang /
T02D3532:174a-41: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3532:174a-42: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas mngon par 'dod
T02D3532:174a-43: pa'i dngos grub 'gugs par byed par bsam par bya'o
T02D3532:174a-44: // aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li ba d'a li
T02D3532:174a-45: ba r'a li b'a r'a h'a mu khi sarba dusht'a
T02D3532:174a-46: pra dusht'a nam mu kham bandha bandha h'um sv'a h'a
T02D3532:174a-47: // / lha mo ba d'a li sngon du gsungs pa'i gos dang /
T02D3532:174a-48: rgyan dang sku mdog lta bu phyag g-yon pa zhags pa dang /
T02D3532:174b-1: g-yas na yal ga dang khab bsnams pas gdug pa
T02D3532:174b-2: can rnams kyi kha mig 'tshem par byed pa lho
T02D3532:174b-4: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li ba d'a li ba
T02D3532:174b-5: r'a li b'a r'a h'a mu khi sarba dusht'a nam
T02D3532:174b-6: stam bha ya bam sv'a h'a /
T02D3532:174b-7: zhes pas lha mo ba r'a li de bzhin du gos dang rgyan dang kha dog la /
T02D3532:174b-8: 'on kyang phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang khab bsnams pa /
T02D3532:174b-10: mya ngan med pa'i shing bsnams pa /
T02D3532:174b-11: gdug pa can rnams rengs par byed pa nub tu dgod par bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-12: aom m'a r'i tsyee batt'a li ba d'a li ba
T02D3532:174b-13: r'a li b'a r'a h'a mu khi sarba satv'a na
T02D3532:174b-14: me ba sha ma n'a ya ho:sv'a h'a /
T02D3532:174b-15: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lha mo phag zhal ma sku
T02D3532:174b-16: mdog dmar mo de bzhin du gos dang rgyan dang
T02D3532:174b-17: / yang phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02D3532:174b-19: g-yon na mya ngan med pa'i shing dang gzhu bsnams
T02D3532:174b-20: pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par byed
T02D3532:174b-21: pa can byang phyogs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-22: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams dang /
T02D3532:174b-23: de'i sngags kyis kyang dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-24: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02D3532:174b-27: dbang du bya bas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-28: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings la /
T02D3532:174b-29: mthe'u chung lcags kyu chen po ste /
T02D3532:174b-30: tshigs mang po'i rtse mo dag lcags sgrog rgyab tu btsir ba la sogs pas /
T02D3532:174b-31: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:zhes pa 'dis ye shes
T02D3532:174b-32: sems dpa' mdun du gdan drangs nas mchod pa la
T02D3532:174b-34: 'od zer can gyi phyag rgyas de nas aom badzra
T02D3532:174b-35: p'a sha h'um 'dis gzhug par bya'o / aom badzra
T02D3532:174b-36: spho ta pam 'dis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-37: aom badzra a'a be sha ho:'dis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-38: de nas dam tshig gi lha rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D3532:174b-40: lag pa gnyis po mnyam byas nas //
T02D3532:174b-41: thal mo'i rnam par bsres bya ste //
T02D3532:174b-42: mtheb chen dang ni ming med kyi //
T02D3532:174b-43: rtse mo gnyis po bye ba yis //
T02D3532:174b-44: gung mo'i sor mo yang dag 'khyud //
T02D3532:174b-45: 'khyil pa'i rnam par bcings pa dag / skyil krung steng du nyer bzhag nas //
T02D3532:174b-46: lte ba'i phyogs su dgod par bya //
T02D3532:174b-47: rab mchog phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
T02D3532:174b-48: las rnams kun la legs par sbyor //
T02D3532:175a-0: @175a * // de nas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
T02D3532:175a-1: phyag rgya chen po ni mtheb chen sems dpa'i skyil krung bkug nas mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzung ste /
T02D3532:175a-2: 'di'i gung mo aom yig lhag ma rdo rje thal
T02D3532:175a-3: mo sbyar ba spyi bor bkod nas aom bhu:kham mam
T02D3532:175a-4: zhes pa dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang
T02D3532:175a-5: mdzad gser gyi mdog lta bu byang chub mchog gi
T02D3532:175a-7: spyi bor aom bsams nas bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3532:175a-8: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i sngags 'bar zhing 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3532:175a-9: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am sv'a h'a /
T02D3532:175a-10: zhes bltas la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3532:175a-11: ji ltar nus pa'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D3532:175a-12: lha mo thams cad yang dag par rgyal bar blta
T02D3532:175a-14: phyi nas chad lhag bskang pa'i cho ga yi ge brgya pas kha bskang bar bya'o //
T02D3532:175a-15: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D3532:175a-17: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D3532:175a-20: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D3532:175a-21: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3532:175a-22: sarba siddhim me pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um /
T02D3532:175a-24: bha ga b'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra
T02D3532:175a-25: m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma
T02D3532:175a-26: ya satva a'a: 'dis dus thams cad du gshegs su
T02D3532:175a-27: gsol zhing dge ba yongs su bsngo zhing mngon par
T02D3532:175a-28: 'dod pa'i dngos grub zhus te rang gi phyag rgya
T02D3532:175a-29: spyi bor bkrol nas aom m'a r'i tsyee mu:zhes so
T02D3532:175a-30: // rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis zas dang khrus dang /
T02D3532:175a-31: nyal ba la sogs pa thams cad du rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02D3532:175a-32: de'i phyir rim pa 'dis lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar byas nas ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02D3532:175a-33: 'phags ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa yis //
T02D3532:175a-34: dge ba nyer bsags gang de yis //
T02D3532:175a-35: ye shes dri med 'od zer can //
T02D3532:175a-36: skye bos go 'phang thob par shog / aom kha
T02D3532:175a-37: kha kh'a hi kh'a hi grihna grihna tu sarba bh'u
T02D3532:175a-38: ta k'i ba li ma ma sh'antim kum ru bandhu
T02D3532:175a-39: sv'a h'a / zhes pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma 'bul lo //
T02D3532:175a-40: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
